entries.meaning: A bone containing edible marrow. [from 14th c.]
(humorous, chiefly in the plural) The shins or knees, chiefly in references to kneeling. [from 16th c.]
examples: So the news of the split between the old and the young one caused plenty of conversation, you may be sure; and will Mr. Robert go down on his marrowbones? and what has he done? was all the question.
